summary: ICP canister-based React + Motoko web app for “Institution Hero”, gated by Internet Identity sign-in, using Shadcn UI, with content-driven pages plus interactive Activities (affirmation/feedback + micro-solution validation with pop-culture quotes and reference-aligned citations), and About the Author social profile buttons, alongside generated brand/hero assets.

existing_features.title: ICP project scaffold (build template) with deploy/build scripts
existing_features.description: Project includes standardized build template assets (Dockerfile, deploy script, ICP YAML config, workspace/package configs) to build and deploy the app.

existing_features.title: Motoko backend canister with Candid interface bindings
existing_features.description: Backend canister implemented in Motoko with generated frontend declaration files (backend.did.* and backend.d.ts) and canister configuration.

existing_features.title: React frontend app shell with routing across multiple pages
existing_features.description: Frontend includes App.tsx/AppShell and multiple routed pages such as Overview, Activities, Learning Outcomes, Session Outline, Takeaways, References, and Bio.

existing_features.title: Internet Identity authentication integration with sign-in gate
existing_features.description: Frontend includes hooks and UI to authenticate via Internet Identity and gate access to app content.

existing_features.title: Content modules for proposal/learning materials
existing_features.description: Structured content is provided via frontend/src/content/proposalContent.ts and rendered in dedicated pages and sections.

existing_features.title: UI component library integrated (Shadcn UI) with Tailwind setup
existing_features.description: Large set of Shadcn UI components added under src/components/ui with Tailwind/Vite/PostCSS configuration and lint rules.

existing_features.title: Leadership word patterns summary component
existing_features.description: Feature component to display a summarized view of leadership word patterns within the learning materials.

existing_features.title: Micro-solutions community list component
existing_features.description: Feature component to render a community list of micro-solutions as part of the learning content.

existing_features.title: Frontend actor/query hooks for canister interaction
existing_features.description: Frontend includes hooks and utilities to create canister actors and manage queries against the backend canister.

existing_features.title: Asset pipeline scripts and generated brand/hero images
existing_features.description: Includes scripts to resize/prune images and generated hero banner/logo assets stored under public/assets/generated.

existing_features.title: Update Activity 1 frontend so the “Get a Word of Affirmation” feedback section displays a canister-provided next quote (from the Activity 1 pool) instead of using the current deterministic Star Wars-only quote selector.

Update Activity 2 frontend so the validation feedback quote displayed after “Validate My Micro-Solution” and “Generate Another” is retrieved from the canister’s Activity 2 quote pool (per-user non-repeating), while keeping the existing citation/message generation behavior intact unless it must change to accommodate the new quote source.
Add React Query hooks/mutations to call the new quote endpoints and ensure cache invalidation/refresh works correctly when identity changes (consistent with existing useActor + React Query patterns).

new_feature_requests.summary: Per signed-in user, cycle non-repeating feedback quotes for Activities 1 & 2 with persistence in Motoko canister: 100 quotes per franchise (Star Wars, Avengers, Batman, Harry Potter) per activity (400/activity), no repeats until pool exhausted then reset.

Implement canister-side, per–signed-in user (Internet Identity Principal) quote cycling for Activity 1 and Activity 2 such that each user receives a non-repeating sequence of feedback quotes until the pool is exhausted, then the sequence resets and continues.

Add quote pools in the Motoko canister for Activities 1 and 2 with at least 400 quotes per activity: 100 each from Star Wars, Avengers, Batman, and Harry Potter (each activity maintains its own independent pool). Each quote must include quote text, attribution, and universe/franchise label.

Expose new Candid endpoints in backend/main.mo to fetch the next quote for a given activity for the calling user, and (if needed) fetch another next quote without submitting again (to support Activity 2’s “Generate Another” behavior).

Ensure backward compatibility of existing stored Activity 1/2 submissions while adding new canister state for quote cycling; add backend/migration.mo only if required to preserve existing state on upgrade per the project’s conditional migration policy.

architectural_notes: Frontend is a React + Vite + Tailwind app using Shadcn UI components and custom ESLint rules.
Authentication is handled via Internet Identity with a SignInGate pattern and dedicated hooks.
Backend is an ICP Motoko canister with Candid interface and generated TypeScript bindings for the frontend.
Project includes a reusable build template with Docker/deploy scripts plus image pipeline utilities (resize/prune).
App includes interactive Activity 1/2 UI flows with participant inputs and generated feedback/validation text using themed quotes and reference-aligned citations.
About the Author section includes external social profile link buttons (LinkedIn, Instagram).
Slide/deck section is to be completely removed (routes, navigation links, components, and any related data) and slide-specific assets/content deleted; user may revisit later.

Activity 1/2 feedback quote rotation must be persisted per authenticated user in the Motoko canister so it survives reloads and is consistent across devices; enforce non-repeating quote selection until the per-user pool is exhausted, then allow reset.
